New Records: Endrick became the youngest male player to score an international goal at Wembley at 17 years and 246 days old.
Key Match Events: Endrick scored the only goal of the match in the 80th minute.
Pre-Game Insights: England was missing captain Harry Kane and other regulars.
Brazil gave debuts to five players in their starting 11 due to injuries to key players.
Post-Match Reflections: Endrick expressed his happiness about scoring his first goal for Brazil.
Gareth Southgate was happy with his team's performance overall.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Real Madrid trumped other top clubs to sign Endrick.
Others: The match appeared to be heading for a stalemate until Endrick's breakthrough.
Endrick came close to scoring again in the dying seconds but was saved by Jordan Pickford.
